attributes.action: Make organ donations an 'opt out' rather than an 'opt in'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Research by Johnson & Goldstein (2003) has shown that if the default is organ donation rather than the individual deciding to donate their organs, then the donation rates are close to 95%. The UK has about 18% donation rate, of which have an 'opt in' approach whilst countries like Sweden, Portugal, France and Austria all have an 'opt out' approach have donation rates between 90-99%. This will decrease organ donor waiting lists to a mere few days compared to months or even years. Sign now and show your support.

government_responses.details:
